Head: Dull headache, especially in young people, face stupid, heavy; vertigo, meniere's disease

details: Indicated when iodine has but partially relieved its cases of laryngitis and bronchitis, catarrhal pneumonia, oedema of lungs.
name: Ammonium jodatum
dosage: Second and third trit. Compare: Ammonium tartaricum (Dry hacking cough after every cold).
